lines.text: [first lines]
to protect the girls from whatever happened to the last ones.

Now listen up. Last night one of our agents got into the house and found some kind of weird security system. Hidden cameras in almost every room and a series of traps. Our agent spliced an over-ride into the security system, allowing you to control the cameras and the traps with this remote unit. Use the traps to capture anyone, or anything that endangers the lifes of those girls. But make sure you don't trap someone you should be protecting. One slight problem; the traps are protected with an access code. They won't work unless you enter the right code. Right now the code is set to blue, and you have control of the traps, but anyone inside the house can change that code at anytime. So pay close attention to what they're saying.

This is my attack squad. And this is Kelli. One of my best undercover agents. She'll be arriving with the rest of the girls. I'm putting her life, and the life of those other girls in your hands. So don't even think about messing up! If you don't have the brains or the guts for this assingment, give the controls to someone who does! The girls should be pulling into the driveway. You're wasting time!
[Lisa opens the shower and sees in Aug inside]
Megan, this isn't gonna work; you're not scaring me!
[several other augs enter from the secret entrance and corner her]
Wait! What are you doing? No! Leave me alone! Help!

I don't believe what I just saw! Those bloodsuckers just got Lisa, and you had a chance to save her! I put the lives of those girls in your hands and you screwed up! I'm pulling the plug on you before you do any more damage.
[if too many Augers escape]

Look, it was your job to protect Kelli and the rest of those girls. From what I've seen the place is overrun. You've missed way too many of those suckers! Until you can figure out how to do your job, you're dismissed. Breaking contact.

So you're the troublemaker. Well I guess you think you're pretty smart, huh? Well Tony told me all about it, including the override in the hall. So, Tony gets Kelli, I get the controller; and you, you get nothing.
Control! Control, help me! You'd better help me please! Use the trap.
[Sheila comes closer towards Kelly]
Now!
[If you trap Sheila that Kelly orders you to]
A closet trap?
It was gonna be a bit of surprise.
[the bed ejects Sarah through the wall]

[Praising you]
Thanks.
Come on, you guys. You've gotta help me, please. Use the traps!
[Victor and Sarah enter]
Now!
[If you trap Victor that Kelly orders you to]
The wall trap!
[the wall ejects Victor through another wall]
Yeah!
Help me, please. You're the only one who can save me.
You're all mine now!
[If you successfully save Kelly's life using the trap on Sarah]
NO! NO!
[the floor ejects Sarah through itself]
[if you fail to trap Sarah]
Who's side are you on anyway?
Just relax, you won't feel a thing.
[she bits Kelli]
No, how can you let this happen? AHHHH!
[if you fail to trap Shelia]
Looks like your friends won't be helping you this time!
WHAT ARE YOU DOING?
[if you failed to trap Shelia but trapped the other vampires]
Way to go control, for a moment I thought I was a goner.
[two Augers grab Kelli as Shelia enters]
Oh, it's not over yet my little darling.
[she bites Kelli]
No! No! How could this happen? AHHH!
[Kelly praises you if you get a perfect trap record]

Alright, you are perfect. Nobody's ever done that. I knew I could count on you. Thanks, you are wonderful. And next time I'm on special assingment, I'm gonna insist that you back me up. I could go anywhere with you, and feel secure knowing me that you were at the controls.
[She walks away from you]
Nah, you wouldn't!
[If you let Kelly go downstairs nicely instead of accidentally trapping her]
I didn't think so. Bye-bye, see ya next time!
I know how it can be Tony. I was young once too you know. You are a very special boy, we both know that. But you must start doing your job, we all have to do our job.
I know.
Now help your cousin with that.
It's about time!
Sorry, it didn't dawn on me.
I'll dawn on you in a minute if you don't get on the ball.
I'm sorry.
You cretini.
Open the door. Open the door!
In a minute.
How hard can it be to open a stupid door?
[he opens it, he and Jeff carry boxes outside]
Can you close the door? Close the door. How hard can it be to close a stupid door?
You with me control? We're going in.
Looks like a healthy bunch.
Yes it should be a good weekend.
Too bad we have to visit the Augs tonight. I'd much rather stay here and enjoy our new guests.
Now Victor, we can't forget about the poor Augers.
You and your charity work is beginning to get a bit much too much.
Sarah, your house looks so beautiful beside the lake?
Really? I thought it looked like a swap.

[sighs]
Hello Megan.
Has anybody seen my scenwa bag?
Which one? You got about a million of them.
Back off goof face. You're just lucky I brought you along.
The only reason you brought me along is cos mom made you.
Shut up!

[sarcastically]
Well I can tell this is gonna be fun.
[Eddie is watching the house]
Sarah, who's that?
Oh that's Weird Eddie; he's one of the neighbours.
He's really tuned out.
[Megan finds a frozen red block in the freezer]
What's this?
Oh... home made cherry popsicles.
We all have our own very special cravings around here.
Curious little bunch. What's wrong?
Well there's something about Kelli.
Hmm. Woman's intuition again, huh?
Oh Victor, you monster. Let's have the boys change the code to be safe.
Hi Eddie. Bye Eddie. Nice of you to drop by Eddie. Oh, and let us know when you want to die Eddie.
Sarah, your parents are leaving.
So?
So? Sarah, we're in this huge house, with all your friends! We have telephones, we have a car, your parents are gone, and you say so?
Come on Sarah, what's the first thing you think of?
PARTY!
This is my cousin, Tony.
Sis, we gotta talk.
And my gracious brother, Jeff.
What's going on?
That girl looks exactly like Madeline.
Not that again!
No, not that again.
Come on studly, we better change that code.
Sarah, your cousin's adorable. How old is he?
Older then you might think.
Hey Sarah, this is a big house. Do you have a big family?
No, just my parents, my brother and me. But you never know who'll drop in.
[Kelli looks at the camera suspiciously]
You're not gonna trash your face with this junk are you?
Megan, it could be a lot worse.
Look at this stuff. You know, they should test it on rats before they let people like you play with it.
Right, how would they do that Megan?
With a little rat! See, first you put them in a chair like that...
[She clamps Lisa's hand]

[in a squeaky voice]
"Oh no, Miss Lisa! That was too tight!"
[in ordinary voice]
Then you sprinkle powder over his face.
[squeaky voice]
"Oh no Miss Lisa! I can't breathe!"
Hey, Cindy, are you alright?
Yeah, I feel great!
Jeffrey, you shouldn't have bitten her!
Well, I,uh,couldn't help myself. Anyway she told be about the override back in the hallway, so now we've got control back!
Oh, splendid! Come on, darling, let's go to the controls!
Hey! Wait! What's going on?
One moment, lieutenant!
Darling, would you like to do the honors?
Thank you, dear.
You see, Leuitennant, we were trying to help the poor unfortunate augors!
Augors?
Those were those thing that were chasing us around the house, trying to get our blood!
Oh, Kelli, I think you're overreacting!
What is an augor?
A vampire vicim who's have dead, left there to die!
Poor creatures have just enough blood to survive, but not enough to become vampires!
Poor creatures? Those things are monsters! See! See! These people are crazy!
It's a wicked curse! Wondering about, looking for blood, hoping one day to become a vampire!
Ew-w-w!
Vampires? You've got to be jiving me! Let's cuff these freaks and drag them downtown!
Hold it! I don't think you understand, Mr. Martin, but you are all in serious trouble!
No, leiutennant, I'm afraid it is YOU that doesn't understand!
